exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : V x : K Unable to unify "is_linear (fun _ : ?U => zero) /\\ (forall x0 : ?U, is_filter_lim ?F x0 -> is_domin ?F (fun y : ?U => minus y x0) (fun y : ?U => minus (minus ((fun _ : ?U => ?M2363) y) ((fun _ : ?U => ?M2363) x0)) ((fun _ : ?U => zero) (minus y x0))))" with "is_linear (fun y : K => scal y zero) /\\ (forall x0 : AbsRing_NormedModule K, is_filter_lim (locally x) x0 -> is_domin (locally x) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule K => minus y x0) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule K => minus (minus ((fun _ : K => a) y) ((fun _ : K => a) x0)) ((fun y0 : K => scal y0 zero) (minus y x0))))".

original: intros a x. unfold is_derive. apply filterdiff_const.
